Method.Name: clear
Method.Description: Clears all messages in the console.

Method.Name: count
Method.Descrption: The 'Count' method counts the number of times 'console.count()' is called.

Method.Name: error
Method.Descrption: The error() method writes an error message to the console.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Description: Required. The error message to write to the console.

Method.Name: group
Method.Descrption: The group() method starts a message group. All new messages will be written inside this group.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Description: Optional. A label for the group.

Method.Name: groupCollapsed
Method.Descrption: The GroupCollapsed() method starts a collapsed message group. In the Console, click the expand button to open the new message group. All new messages will now be written inside this group.

Method.Name: groupEnd
Method.Descrption: The GroupEnd() ends a message group.

Method.Name: info
Method.Descrption: The Info() method writes a message to the console.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Description: Required. The message to write to the console.

Method.Name: log
Method.Descrption: The Log() method writes (logs) a message to the console.

Method.Name: time
Method.Descrption: The Time() method starts a timer in the console view.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Description: Optional. A label to give the timer a name.

Method.Name: timeEnd
Method.Descrption: The TimeEnd() method ends a timer, and writes the result to the console.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Description: Optional. The name of the timer.

Method.Name: trace
Method.Descrption: The Trace() method displays a trace that show how the code ended up at a certain point.

Parameter.Name: label
Parameter.Description: Optional. A label to give the timer a name.

Method.Name: warn
Method.Description: The Warning() method writes a warning to the console.

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Description: Required. The message (warning) to write to the console.
